body.name: Small Weekly Calendar Dry Erase Whiteboard for Wall, 16" x 12" Magnetic Dry Erase Board, Hanging Double-Sided White Board, Portable Board for List, Kitchen, Planning, Memo, Home, Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 46 mins
features: Multi-Use Calendar Dry Erase Board: Our magnetic monthly whiteboard can put your life in order and plan ahead. You can write down your weekly schedule, and this whiteboard planner is perfect to plan ahead any activities, reminders, appointments, tasks. The magnetic double-sided whiteboard allows you to have two projects going. The other sided is blank. It is the best tool for home teaching or memo. It can hang on wall to remind you not forget the important thing.

Weekly Planner & Whiteboard: This whiteboard provides double side, white board and dry erase calendar board. Dry erase weekly calendar for busy people to keep in track of event, dates, or use as to-do list, aid to daily tasks. The movable hanging hooks allow you to adjust the hanging distance easily. Small Portable white board can be hung horizontally and vertically as you like. This whiteboard is great for homeschool, distance learning, daily reminder, grocery list, to do list, meal plans.

Never Miss the Important Thing: The board is printed with an undated Week Calendar grid. Our hangable dry erase board is cool for the kitchen, dorm, bedroom, homeschool and office. The whiteboard is a great classroom learning board that help students lesson plans go smoothly. Perfect vision board organizer for planning weekly schedule, to do list tasks and family chores organization. The weekly board is the perfect visual tool for clear communication.

Super Value Pack of Small Whiteboard: The 16 X 12 inches double-sided weekly planner dry erase board set comes with 10 pcs magnetic dry erase markers (include 8 color), 4 pcs magnetic piece, 1 pcs dry eraser. This big dry erase whiteboard is great size for wall, office desktop, study table, bedside table, class podium and kitchen counter. Double sided wall hangable small magnet dry erase whiteboard easel with solidly built but light weight which makes it suitable for handheld as well.

Smoothly Writing & Easy to Clean: Magnetic white board comes with a smooth and durable writing surface. It's easy to write on and easy to wipe clean without stain. Teach your kid the value of getting organized and always be on time. Our magnetic dry erase calendar makes it easy to always be a step ahead of your schedule. Our white board set is safe for kids. dry erase board is specially made for home, kitchen, teacher, office or anywhere you want. Perfect for reading, learning, memo, to do list.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this product and am happy I invested in it. It erases easily with no stain and you’re supplied with many marker colors. I use this every month and enjoy the wide calendar view it gives me. It’s also strong enough to be held onto a wall by two thumb tacks. Awesome product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Help keep the week organized and it’s perfect for any space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my at home school area.
reviews.reviewText: I am going to college and love this at my desk. Easy to see due dates and adjust things as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little bulky, but it does its job
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my husband, I thought I was ordering the weekly planner, but when I changed the color I guess it changed it to the monthly calendar but there was no color change with the trim of it. It’s a bit bulkier than I would have liked, but it’s serving its purpose and the markers don’t leave stains on the white board which is nice. Do plan to have a place to store the markers though because there is NO space on the board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size. Has all needed pens and erasers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Board is as expected. It works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm taking college courses so this dry erase board is perfect for keeping up with assignments and deadlines. It has days of the week on one side and a blank page on the other!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the board. The markers don’t really write great on the board tho. Smears off and does stay on the board. Not really worth it it I can’t write on it with the markers provided
